title: Police: Apparent accidental shooting kills teen
content:
LOGANSPORT - Police say a Logansport teenager has died following an apparent accident involving a firearm.
Just after midnight Thursday, police were called to a report of a man shot at a residence in the 800 block of 21st Street in Logansport.
On scene, police found Jacob Graf, 18, unresponsive after suffering a wound from a 9mm firearm. He was transported to Logansport Memorial Hospital and pronounced dead there.
Police say he was with a friend in the residence handling the gun when it fired accidentally.
Graf was a recent graduate of Logansport High School, where he was a standout cross country athlete.
